sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is suspended from a high place
, je pritrjeno tako, da visi z visoke točke.

seg.quote: A model aeroplane was suspended above the stage.

sense.def:
To suspend something
pomeni nekaj preložiti na poznejši čas ali za nekaj časa ustaviti.

Kadar nekdo
is suspended from their job
, mu nadrejeni ukažejo, da nekaj časa ne sme delati, največkrat kot kazen.

seg.quote: The people involved in the incident have been suspended from their duties.
